Module cerei
Package au.org.nifpi.cerei

Class PEIPerMonth

java.lang.Object
au.org.nifpi.cerei.PEIPerMonth
public class PEIPerMonth extends Object
Low level working class that provides most of the detail functionality used to calculate PEIs Could do with refactoring to separate out Cost and PEI with some commonality in a yet to be designed parent class
Author:
Copyright (c) 2023 University of Technology Sydney and Federation University under MIT License.

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected int
    daysInMonth
    Number of days in this particular month: 28, 29, 30 or 31 as appropriate
    protected int
    daysInYear
    Number of days in this year: 365 or 366 as appropriate
    protected double
    feedInLossRatio
    Feed In Tariff Loss ratio per meter per month.
    protected String
    meterName
    Name of the meter
    protected int
    month
    Month for which results are being generated
    protected double
    monthlyGenerated
    Accumulate power generated for the month in kWh
    protected double
    monthlyNett
    Accumulate net power used for the month in kWh (monthlyUsage - monthlyGenerated)

    monthlyUsage
    Accumulate power use for the month in kWh
    protected int
    numberOfMeasurements
    Number of lines of data in usage and price files for the month

    Shoulder power used over the month

    Spot Price Loss ratio per meter per month.
    protected double
    sumMonthlyTotalCharge
    Rolling 30 minute accumulation of the (total 30 minute price in c/kWh) for the month
    protected double
    sumMonthlyTotalChargeUsage
    Rolling 30 minute accumulation of the (total 30 minute price in c/kWh multiple by the 30 minute usage) for the month
    protected int
    year
    Year for which results are being generated

    addMonthlyParameters(MonthlyParameter monthlyParameter)
    Load the Spot Price Loss Ratio and the Feed-in Loss Ratio from the relevant parameters for that particular month
    protected void
    addUnitOfCharges(NetworkParameter networkParameters, LocalDateTime recordDateTime, double usage, double spotPrice, double generated, double feedInTariff)
    Inner loop that processes each 30 minute spot price and usage to accumulate overall usage and 30 minute PEI accumulators The PEI calculations can be optimised by removing them from this inner loop.
    protected void
    calcuateCharges()
    Calculate all charges once usage and price files for that meter and month processed.

  • Constructor Details

    • PEIPerMonth

      public PEIPerMonth(String meterName, int month, int year)
      Create a data structure to hold the cost and pei data for a single meter for a single month.
      Parameters:
      meterName - The name of the meter that this information pertains to.
      month - The month of the year that this information pertains to.
      year - The calendar year that this information pertains to.

  • Method Details

    • addMonthlyParameters

      protected void addMonthlyParameters(MonthlyParameter monthlyParameter)
      Load the Spot Price Loss Ratio and the Feed-in Loss Ratio from the relevant parameters for that particular month
      Parameters:
      monthlyParameter - The parameters associated with the month under consideration

    • addUnitOfCharges

      protected void addUnitOfCharges(NetworkParameter networkParameters, LocalDateTime recordDateTime, double usage, double spotPrice, double generated, double feedInTariff)
      Inner loop that processes each 30 minute spot price and usage to accumulate overall usage and 30 minute PEI accumulators The PEI calculations can be optimised by removing them from this inner loop. However, that would make understanding the code more difficult. For now, inner loop left as inefficient
      Parameters:
      networkParameters - Complete Energy charge, Network charge, Spot Energy, Market charge and Other Charge Loss ratios and pricing.
      recordDateTime - Timestamp for this particular reading
      usage - energy used from grid
      spotPrice - Spot price that applies to this particular reading
      generated - energy generated
      feedInTariff - Feed in tarrif that applies to this particular reading

    • calcuateCharges

      protected void calcuateCharges() throws Exception
      Calculate all charges once usage and price files for that meter and month processed.
      Throws:
      Exception - Rethrows exceptions from called methods - most likely divide by zero exception when calculating PEIs
